product_name: The North Face Glacier Full-Zip Fleece Hoodie - Toddler Girls'
long_description: The North Face Glacier full-zip fleece hoodie gives little girls a cheerful and colorful layer of soft warmth when the going gets cold. Lightweight fabric resists pilling and fading, packs easily and maintains its shape. Full-length zipper; handwarmer pockets.
short_description: The North Face Glacier full-zip fleece hoodie gives little girls a cheerful and colorful layer of soft warmth when the going gets cold.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
product_group: Infants And Toddlers Fleece Jackets And Pants
